comment: Smart Data Models - PssIEEE3B adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/PssIEEE3B/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Std 421.5-2005 type PSS3B power system stabilizer model. The PSS model PSS3B has dual inputs of electrical power and rotor angular frequency deviation. The signals are used to derive an equivalent mechanical power signal.  Reference: IEEE 3B 421.5-2005 Section 8.3.

contents.name: a1
contents.comment: Notch filter parameter (A1).  Typical Value = 0.359. Default: 0.0

contents.name: a2
contents.comment: Notch filter parameter (A2).  Typical Value = 0.586. Default: 0.0

contents.name: a3
contents.comment: Notch filter parameter (A3).  Typical Value = 0.429. Default: 0.0

contents.name: a4
contents.comment: Notch filter parameter (A4).  Typical Value = 0.564. Default: 0.0

contents.name: a5
contents.comment: Notch filter parameter (A5).  Typical Value = 0.001. Default: 0.0

contents.name: a6
contents.comment: Notch filter parameter (A6).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: a7
contents.comment: Notch filter parameter (A7).  Typical Value = 0.031. Default: 0.0

contents.name: a8
contents.comment: Notch filter parameter (A8).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: inputSignal1Type
contents.comment: Type of input signal #1.  Typical Value = generatorElectricalPower. Default: None

contents.name: inputSignal2Type
contents.comment: Type of input signal #2.  Typical Value = rotorSpeed. Default: None

contents.name: ks1
contents.comment: Gain on signal # 1 (Ks1).  Typical Value = -0.602. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ks2
contents.comment: Gain on signal # 2 (Ks2).  Typical Value = 30.12. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: t1
contents.comment: Transducer time constant (T1).  Typical Value = 0.012. Default: 0

contents.name: t2
contents.comment: Transducer time constant (T2).  Typical Value = 0.012. Default: 0

contents.name: tw1
contents.comment: Washout time constant (Tw1).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0

contents.name: tw2
contents.comment: Washout time constant (Tw2).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0

contents.name: tw3
contents.comment: Washout time constant (Tw3).  Typical Value = 0.6. Default: 0

contents.name: vstmax
contents.comment: Stabilizer output max limit (Vstmax).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vstmin
contents.comment: Stabilizer output min limit (Vstmin).  Typical Value = -0.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
